author: Reuters
title: Some African countries may face 'huge peak' in coronavirus cases 'very soon,' WHO warns
description: Some African countries could see a peak in coronavirus cases in the coming weeks, and testing should be urgently increased in the region, World Health Organization officials said Thursday.
content:
Some African countries could see a peak in coronavirus cases in the coming weeks, and testing should be urgently increased in the region, World Health Organization officials said Thursday.
